item.title: Redux 1
item.description: Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript apps. import { createStore } from "redux"; //an import from the redux library const store = createStore(); // Takes reducer as argument Store stores the states and reducers handles the communication Reducers modifies the state based on action in pure state In redux, all application state exists as a single store object Spread operator or splat operator copies the contents of one array object into another.
